data.name: Failed State Demo
data.detailed_description:
The old world is gone. The Earth decided to get rid of humanity that have poisoned it for thousand years. Earthquakes, tsunamis, volcano erupts and following technological catastrophes - results of the first wave. The most of cities are in ruins, and people search the way to prevent future catastrophes and save the ashes of civilization. But the nature has its own plans.
The second wave started in Ukraine, and so did the story of Rose, the girl that almost forgot what the old world used to be like.

In Failed State Demo version you'll get a chance to spend your first minutes in this unforgiving realm, get familiar with game style, plot, visual design and gameplay. In the current version of Demo only first Act is available.

data.short_description: The old world is gone. The second wave started in Ukraine, and so did the story of Rose, the girl that almost forgot what the old world used to be like. Get a chance to spend your first minutes in this unforgiving realm, get familiar with game style, plot, visual design and gameplay of Failed State.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any Dual Core processor 1.0 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Embedded Graphics Solution (Inter HD Graphics)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Also supports OpenGL ES rendering method

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Embedded Graphics Solution (Inter HD Graphics)
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian, Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, Steam OS
  • Processor: Any Dual Core processor 1.0 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Embedded Graphics Solution (Inter HD Graphics)
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
